00022 #include "chipstream/SelfDoc.h"
00023 
00024 bool SelfDoc::Opt::checkOption() const {
00025       bool minOk = false, maxOk = false;
00026       bool doThrow = Err::getThrowStatus();
00027       Err::setThrowStatus(true); 
00028       try {
00029         switch (type) {
00030         case SelfDoc::Opt::String :
00031             // no check for strings...
00032             minOk = true;
00033             maxOk = true;
00034             break;
00035         case SelfDoc::Opt::Integer :
00036             minOk = minVal == "NA" || (asInt() >= Convert::toInt(minVal.c_str()));
00037             maxOk = maxVal == "NA" || (asInt() <= Convert::toInt(maxVal.c_str()));
00038             break;
00039         case SelfDoc::Opt::Float :
00040             minOk = minVal == "NA" || (asFloat() >= Convert::toFloat(minVal.c_str()));
00041             maxOk = maxVal == "NA" || (asFloat() <= Convert::toFloat(maxVal.c_str()));
00042             break;
00043         case SelfDoc::Opt::Double :
00044             minOk = minVal == "NA" || (asDouble() >= Convert::toDouble(minVal.c_str()));
00045             maxOk = maxVal == "NA" || (asDouble() <= Convert::toDouble(maxVal.c_str()));
00046             break;
00047         case SelfDoc::Opt::Boolean :
00048             minOk = value == "true" || value == "false";
00049             maxOk = value == "true" || value == "false";
00050             break;
00051         default:
00052             Err::errAbort("SelfDoc::Opt::checkOption() - Don't recognize type: " + ToStr(type));
00053         }
00054       }
00055       catch(Except &e) {
00056         Err::setThrowStatus(doThrow);
00057         Err::errAbort("SelfDoc::Opt::checkOption() - Invalid value '"+name+"' specified for option '"+value+"'. Error: " + e.what());
00058       }
00059       catch(...) {
00060         Err::setThrowStatus(doThrow);
00061         Err::errAbort("SelfDoc::Opt::checkOption() - Invalid value '"+name+"' specified for option '"+value+"'.");
00062       }
00063       Err::setThrowStatus(doThrow);
00064 
00065       return minOk && maxOk;
00066     }
00067 
00068 double SelfDoc::Opt::asDouble() const { return Convert::toDouble(value.c_str()); }
00069 float SelfDoc::Opt::asFloat() const { return Convert::toFloat(value.c_str()); }
00070 int SelfDoc::Opt::asInt() const { return Convert::toInt(value.c_str()); }
00071 bool SelfDoc::Opt::asBool() const { return Convert::toBool(value.c_str()); }
00072 std::string SelfDoc::Opt::asString() const { return value; }
00073 
00074 std::string SelfDoc::getState() {
00075     std::vector<SelfDoc::Opt>::iterator vecIx;
00076     std::string description = getDocName();
00077     for(vecIx = m_Options.begin(); vecIx != m_Options.end(); ++vecIx) {
00078         description += ".";
00079         description += vecIx->name + "=" + vecIx->asString();
00080     }
00081     return description;
00082 }
00083 
00084 SelfDoc::Opt & SelfDoc::getDocOption(const std::string &name) { 
00085     std::map<std::string, int>::iterator i;
00086     i = m_OptionsIndex.find(name);
00087     if(i == m_OptionsIndex.end()) {
00088       Err::errAbort("SelfDoc::getDocOption() - Can't find option for name: " + ToStr(name));
00089     }
00090     return *(m_Options.begin() + i->second); 
00091   }
00092 
00093 void SelfDoc::setOptValue(const std::string &name, const std::string &value) {
00094     SelfDoc::Opt &opt = getDocOption(name);
00095     opt.value = value;
00096     if(!opt.checkOption()) {
00097         Err::errAbort("SelfDoc::setOptValue() - '" + value + "' is not a valid option for '" + name + "'.");
00098     }
00099 }
00100 
00101 void SelfDoc::setOptValue(const std::string &name, const bool &value) {
00102     SelfDoc::Opt &opt = getDocOption(name);
00103     opt.value = value ? "true" : "false";
00104     if(!opt.checkOption()) {
00105         Err::errAbort("SelfDoc::setOptValue() - '" + ToStr(value ? "true" : "false") + 
00106                       "' is not a valid option for " + name);
00107     }
00108 }
00109 
00110 void SelfDoc::setDocOptions(const std::vector<SelfDoc::Opt> &param) { 
00111     std::map<std::string, int>::iterator offset;
00112     std::vector<SelfDoc::Opt>::const_iterator i;
00113     int count = 0;
00114     m_OptionsIndex.clear();
00115     m_Options.clear();
00116     for(i = param.begin(); i != param.end(); i++) {
00117         offset = m_OptionsIndex.find(i->name);
00118       if(offset != m_OptionsIndex.end()) {
00119           Err::errAbort("SelfDoc::setDocOptions() - Option name '" + i->name + 
00120                         "' has already been seen, names must be unique.");
00121       }
00122       if(!i->checkOption()) {
00123           Err::errAbort("SelfDoc::setDocOptions() - Option '" + i->name + 
00124                         "' doesn't pass its checks.");
00125       }
00126       m_OptionsIndex[i->name] = count++;
00127       m_Options.push_back(*i);
00128     }
00129 }
00130 
00131 SelfDoc SelfDoc::explainSelf() {
00132     SelfDoc doc;
00133     doc.setDocName("no name set");
00134     doc.setDocDescription("Currently undocumented.");
00135     // no parameters.
00136     return doc;
00137 }
00138 
00139 void SelfDoc::printExplanation(SelfDoc &doc, std::ostream &out) {
00140     std::string name = doc.getDocName();
00141     std::string description = doc.getDocDescription();
00142     std::vector<SelfDoc::Opt> opts = doc.getDocOptions();
00143     unsigned int maxLength = 0;
00144     std::vector<SelfDoc::Opt>::iterator iter;
00145     out << name << ":\n";
00146     Util::printStringWidth(out, description.c_str(), 0, name.size() + 2);
00147     out << std::endl;
00148     for(iter = opts.begin(); iter != opts.end(); iter++) {
00149         if(iter->name.size() > maxLength) 
00150             maxLength = iter->name.size();
00151     }
00152     maxLength += 3; // add characters for spaces and quotes
00153     
00154     out << std::endl << "Parameters: " << std::endl;    
00155     if(opts.empty()) {
00156         out << "   --- No Parameters ---   " << std::endl;
00157     }
00158     else {
00159         for(iter = opts.begin(); iter != opts.end(); iter++) {
00160             unsigned int currentLength = 0;
00161             std::string param = iter->name;
00162             std::string explanation = iter->descript + 
00163                 " [default '" + iter->defaultVal+ "']";
00164             out << " '" << param << "' ";
00165             currentLength += param.size();
00166             while(currentLength < maxLength - 3) {
00167                 out.put(' ');
00168                 currentLength++;
00169             }
00170             Util::printStringWidth(out, explanation.c_str(), maxLength+1, currentLength);
00171             out << std::endl;
00172         }
00173     }
00174 }
